description: Start the day right with this healthier apple and cinnamon overnight oats recipe. Your slow cooker will do all the hard work for you while you sleep.
name: Slow Cooker Healthier Apple & Cinnamon Overnight Oats Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Woolworths almond kernels, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place oats, milk, vanilla, cinnamon and 3 cups water in bowl of a 5.5L slow cooker and stir to combine.
Core and roughly chop 2 apples, then stir into oat mixture. Cover with lid and cook on low for 8 hours or until oats are just soft.
Thinly slice remaining apple into rounds. Divide oat mixture among bowls. Serve topped with yoghurt, sliced apple, strawberries, almonds and syrup.
